differentiators: Experience with Claude AI coding and AI-assisted development workflows
Comfortable with daily code reviews and transparent development process
Ability to deliver functional MVP under tight timelines (1-2 weeks)
Fullstack expertise for double-sided marketplace SaaS
next_steps: Schedule video call to clarify reference app and core MVP features
Establish daily standup schedule and code review turnaround expectations
Align on scope boundaries to prevent creep
key_clarifications_needed: Which similar app should we reference?

What specific payment processing do you need?
What are the core MVP features vs nice-to-haves?
